alert.note: Alert for Chautauqua; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 10:59AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND SLOWLY MOVING ONSHORE ALONG LAKE ERIE... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This lake effect snow band is producing heavy snow at the rate of over 1 inch per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1050 AM EST, a lake effect snow band was just offshore from Ripley to Silver Creek, but beginning to come onshore from Derby and Evans to Lackawanna. Expect the snow band to drift slowly east the next two hours, impacting portions of the New York State Thruway from Hamburg to Ripley and Route 5 along the Lake Erie shoreline. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo, West Seneca, Lackawanna, Dunkirk, Fredonia, Hamburg, Evans, Westfield, Small Boat Harbor, Silver Creek, Blasdell, Angola, Woodlawn Beach State Park, Lake Erie State Park, Derby, Evangola State Park, Angola on the Lake, SUNY Fredonia, Portland, and Sheridan. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 54 and 57, and between exits 59 and 61. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
